analyzed: @133a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: nir bi kalpa pra ka ra na /
analyzed: nir bi kalpa pra ka ra na /
translated: Nirvikalpaprakara·πáa

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i rab tu byed pa /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i rab tu byed pa /
translated: The Chapter on Non-conceptuality

original: bla ma dang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩrnam par rtog pa gang gang gis ;
analyzed: bla ma dang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo // rnam par rtog pa gang gang gis ;
translated: Homage to the Guru and the Buddha.üîΩWhatever conceptual thoughts

original: / dngos po gang dang gang brtags pa //
analyzed: / dngos po gang dang gang brtags pa //
translated: There are, by which any thing is imagined,üîΩThis very imagination

original: yongs su brtags pa 'di nyid dang // rang bzhin yod min pa kho na //üîΩslob dpon klu sgrub zhal snga yi //
analyzed: yongs su brtags pa 'di nyid dang // rang bzhin yod min pa kho na // slob dpon klu sgrub zhal snga yi //
translated: And the non-existence of inherent nature are just the same.üîΩThose who have gone outside

original: lam las phyi rol song gyur cing //
analyzed: lam las phyi rol song gyur cing //
translated: The path of the master NƒÅgƒÅrjuna

original: legs par mngon pa'i thabs med pa'i //
analyzed: legs par mngon pa'i thabs med pa'i //
translated: And have no good method for realization,

original: kun rdzob de nyid bden pa las //
analyzed: kun rdzob de nyid bden pa las //
translated: Fall away from the truth of the conventional and the ultimate.

original: nyams pas thar pa'i dngos grub ni //
analyzed: nyams pas thar pa'i dngos grub ni //
translated: Therefore, the attainment of liberation

original: yod pa ma yin de dag nyams //üîΩgang zhig las las byung ba yi //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin de dag nyams // gang zhig las las byung ba yi //
translated: Does not exist for them, and they fall away.

original: rnam par rtog pa gang ci'ang rung //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gang ci'ang rung //
translated: Whatever conceptual thoughtsüîΩArise from karma,

original: de dag spangs pa'i rang bzhin las //
analyzed: de dag spangs pa'i rang bzhin las //
translated: From the nature of their abandonment,

original: mya ngan 'das pa gzhan na ni //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa gzhan na ni //
translated: NirvƒÅ·πáa is not elsewhere,

original: yod min yul ni gang du yang //
analyzed: yod min yul ni gang du yang //
translated: In any place whatsoever.

original: rnam par mi sems bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par mi sems bdag nyid do //
translated: It is the nature of non-conceptuality.

original: gang yang dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: gang yang dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: And whatever arises in the mind

original: sems la bde ba 'byung gyur cing //
analyzed: sems la bde ba 'byung gyur cing //
translated: By the nature of its being delightful,

original: nyams su myong ba'i sar phyin pa //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i sar phyin pa //
translated: And whatever is experienced as a state,

original: de yang kun du rtog pa tsam //
analyzed: de yang kun du rtog pa tsam //
translated: That too is just a conceptual imputation.

original: gang de 'dod chags bral ba yi //
analyzed: gang de 'dod chags bral ba yi //
translated: Whatever is free from attachmentüîΩAnd whatever is its own nature,

original: @133b rang gi ngo bo de dag dang // gnyis po gang yin pa de ni //
analyzed: @133b rang gi ngo bo de dag dang // gnyis po gang yin pa de ni //
translated: And whatever is both of those,

original: srid pa'i rgyu yi mchog yin no //üîΩdngos po dngos po las mi skye //
analyzed: srid pa'i rgyu yi mchog yin no // dngos po dngos po las mi skye //
translated: That is the supreme cause of existence.üîΩA thing does not arise from a thing,

original: dngos po dngos med las kyang min //
analyzed: dngos po dngos med las kyang min //
translated: Nor does it arise from a non-thing.

original: dngos po skye ba rtag tu spangs //
analyzed: dngos po skye ba rtag tu spangs //
translated: The arising of a thing is always rejected.

original: dngos 'khrul nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //
analyzed: dngos 'khrul nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //
translated: A thing is an illusion, like a sky-flower.

original: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams kun //
analyzed: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams kun //
translated: All phenomena are equal to space.

original: skye ba mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid //
analyzed: skye ba mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid //
translated: Arising is equal to space.

original: rkyen ni mkha' dang mnyam kun nges //
analyzed: rkyen ni mkha' dang mnyam kun nges //
translated: Conditions are definitely equal to space.

original: srid par gyur pa bden pa yin //
analyzed: srid par gyur pa bden pa yin //
translated: Existence is true.

original: rgyu med 'bras bu med gyur cing //
analyzed: rgyu med 'bras bu med gyur cing //
translated: There is no cause, there is no effect,

original: las kyi rang bzhin yod ma yin //
analyzed: las kyi rang bzhin yod ma yin //
translated: And there is no intrinsic nature of karma.

original: 'jig rten pa med 'jig rten med //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa med 'jig rten med //
translated: There is no world, there is no non-world.

original: mi brtan par gyur chos 'di kun //
analyzed: mi brtan par gyur chos 'di kun //
translated: All these phenomena are unstable.

original: ma skyes pas ni dngos po gang //
analyzed: ma skyes pas ni dngos po gang //
translated: How can something that is unborn

original: ji ltar gzhan las shes par gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan las shes par gyur //
translated: Be known through something else?

original: mo gsham bu yi bzhin yang ni //
analyzed: mo gsham bu yi bzhin yang ni //
translated: It is just like the son of a barren woman‚Äî

original: de ltar shes par mi nus so //
analyzed: de ltar shes par mi nus so //
translated: It cannot be known in that way.

original: 'jig rten gzod nas ma skyes te //
analyzed: 'jig rten gzod nas ma skyes te //
translated: The world has never arisen

original: gang gis kyang ni sprul pa med //
analyzed: gang gis kyang ni sprul pa med //
translated: And is not created by anyone.

original: don med 'khrul pa'i 'jig rten 'di //
analyzed: don med 'khrul pa'i 'jig rten 'di //
translated: This meaningless, deluded world

original: dri za'i grong khyer ji bzhin no //
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer ji bzhin no //
translated: Is just like a city of gandharvas.

original: rnam rtog las gang 'jig rten 'byung //
analyzed: rnam rtog las gang 'jig rten 'byung //
translated: The world arises from conceptualization,

original: rnam rtog sems las byung ba ste //
analyzed: rnam rtog sems las byung ba ste //
translated: And conceptualization arises from the mind.

original: gang phyir lus las sems byung bas //
analyzed: gang phyir lus las sems byung bas //
translated: Since the mind arises from the body,üîΩThe body should be investigated.

original: de phyir lus la rnam par brtag / gzugs stong tshor ba rang bzhin med //üîΩ'du shes med cing 'du byed kyis //
analyzed: de phyir lus la rnam par brtag / gzugs stong tshor ba rang bzhin med // 'du shes med cing 'du byed kyis //
translated: Form is empty, feeling has no intrinsic nature,üîΩAnd perception does not exist.üîΩThe entities of formation

original: dngos po yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: dngos po yod pa ma yin te //
translated: Do not exist,

original: rang rig gsal ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rang rig gsal ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: And the nature of consciousness is clear self-awareness.

original: de la shes dang shes bya med //
analyzed: de la shes dang shes bya med //
translated: There is no knower and no known

original: sems dang sems las byung ba med //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba med //
translated: And no mind and mental factors.

original: 'byung ba med de de yi phyir //
analyzed: 'byung ba med de de yi phyir //
translated: Since there are no elements,

original: rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature is nonconceptual.

original: de ni sems min lus kyang min //
analyzed: de ni sems min lus kyang min //
translated: It is neither the mind nor the body.

original: khams rnams ma yin chos kyang min //
analyzed: khams rnams ma yin chos kyang min //
translated: Not the elements, nor even phenomena,

original: gnyis su med pa'i lam mchog 'di //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i lam mchog 'di //
translated: This supreme nondual path

original: de nyid rig pa rnams kyis gsungs //
analyzed: de nyid rig pa rnams kyis gsungs //
translated: Is taught by those who know suchness.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i chos 'di kun//
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i chos 'di kun//
translated: All these phenomena are nonapprehended,

original: dmigs pa med las rab tu grol //
analyzed: dmigs pa med las rab tu grol //
translated: And from nonapprehension they are fully liberated.

original: dmigs med blo yi dang byas na //
analyzed: dmigs med blo yi dang byas na //
translated: When the mind is purified of apprehension,

original: dmigs pa med par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: dmigs pa med par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: It becomes nonapprehended.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon chen po a'arya de wa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /üîΩ// / pandi ta chen po ma h'a @134a * //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon chen po a'arya de wa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so / // / pandi ta chen po ma h'a @134a * //
translated: The Perfection of Nonconceptuality by the great master ƒÄryadeva is complete.

analyzed: k'a ru na dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba rma ba na chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o//
